learning_paths.name: Complete Foundations Track
learning_paths.description: Comprehensive introduction to the theoretical foundations of Active Inference and the Free Energy Principle

learning_outcomes: Understand theoretical foundations of Active Inference
Apply mathematical concepts to practical problems
Critically evaluate research in the field

learning_paths.name: Information Theory Basics
learning_paths.description: Essential information theory concepts for understanding Active Inference

learning_outcomes: Understand KL divergence as distribution distance
Apply mutual information to measure dependence

learning_paths.name: Bayesian Fundamentals
learning_paths.description: Core concepts of Bayesian probability and inference

learning_outcomes: Apply Bayes' theorem to real problems

learning_paths.name: Free Energy Principle Theory
learning_paths.description: Deep dive into the theoretical foundations of the Free Energy Principle

learning_outcomes: Connect FEP to other theoretical frameworks

learning_paths.name: Active Inference Framework
learning_paths.description: Complete Active Inference framework from theory to implementation

learning_outcomes: Apply Active Inference to real problems

learning_paths.name: Advanced Mathematics Track
learning_paths.description: Rigorous mathematical treatment of Active Inference concepts for advanced learners

metadata.prerequisites: strong background in calculus, linear algebra, probability theory
learning_outcomes: Derive key mathematical results in Active Inference
Connect Active Inference to other mathematical frameworks

learning_paths.name: Practical Implementation Track
learning_paths.description: Hands-on implementation of Active Inference algorithms and systems

learning_outcomes: Implement Active Inference agents from scratch
Debug and optimize Active Inference code

learning_paths.name: Applications Track
learning_paths.description: Real-world applications of Active Inference across different domains

learning_outcomes: Apply Active Inference to specific problem domains
Design generative models for real applications
Evaluate Active Inference solutions in practice

learning_paths.name: Complete Active Inference Curriculum
learning_paths.description: Comprehensive learning path covering all aspects of Active Inference from theory to practice

learning_outcomes: Understand theoretical foundations and practical applications
Implement and deploy Active Inference systems
Teach and communicate Active Inference concepts

learning_paths.name: Quick Start Guide
learning_paths.description: Fast introduction to Active Inference for immediate understanding

learning_outcomes: Grasp the basic principles and framework
See how it can be implemented

learning_paths.name: AI Alignment Track
learning_paths.description: Understanding AI alignment and safety through Active Inference

metadata.target_audience: AI researchers, safety engineers, policy makers
learning_outcomes: Apply Active Inference to AI safety

learning_paths.name: Adaptive Learning Track
learning_paths.description: Building adaptive educational systems using Active Inference

learning_outcomes: Design student models for adaptive learning

learning_paths.name: Control Engineering Track
learning_paths.description: Active Inference applications in control systems and autonomous engineering

metadata.target_audience: control engineers, robotics engineers, systems engineers

learning_paths.name: Climate Decision Making Track
learning_paths.description: Decision making under deep uncertainty for climate applications

metadata.target_audience: climate scientists, environmental policy makers, risk analysts

learning_paths.name: Neuroscience Research Track
learning_paths.description: Specialized track for neuroscientists applying Active Inference to brain and behavior research

learning_outcomes: Apply Active Inference to neural data analysis

learning_paths.name: AI Practitioner Track
learning_paths.description: Practical track for AI engineers and researchers implementing Active Inference systems

metadata.target_audience: AI engineers, machine learning practitioners, robotics engineers
learning_outcomes: Implement Active Inference in production systems
Build generative models for complex environments
Design control systems using expected free energy

learning_paths.name: Policy Maker Track
learning_paths.description: Track for policy makers and decision makers applying Active Inference to public policy and governance

metadata.target_audience: policy makers, public administrators, decision analysts
learning_outcomes: Apply Active Inference to policy design

learning_paths.name: Mathematical Research Track
learning_paths.description: Advanced mathematical track for researchers developing new theory and algorithms

metadata.prerequisites: advanced mathematics, probability theory, differential geometry
learning_outcomes: Connect Active Inference to other mathematical frameworks
Prove theoretical results and derive algorithms

learning_paths.name: Educator Track
learning_paths.description: Track for educators teaching Active Inference and related concepts

learning_paths.name: Psychology and Clinical Applications Track
learning_paths.description: Track for psychologists and clinicians applying Active Inference to mental health and behavior

learning_outcomes: Apply Active Inference to mental health disorders
Understand cognitive processes through predictive coding
Model patient behavior and treatment response

learning_paths.name: Engineering Applications Track
learning_paths.description: Track for engineers applying Active Inference to control systems, robotics, and autonomous technologies

metadata.target_audience: control engineers, robotics engineers, systems engineers

learning_paths.name: Philosophy of Mind Track
learning_paths.description: Track for philosophers interested in philosophy of mind, consciousness, and theoretical foundations

metadata.target_audience: philosophers of mind, cognitive scientists, theoretical researchers
learning_outcomes: Understand philosophical implications of Active Inference
Analyze theories of consciousness and cognition

learning_paths.name: Interdisciplinary Research Track
learning_paths.description: Comprehensive track for researchers applying Active Inference across multiple disciplines

metadata.target_audience: interdisciplinary researchers, advanced graduate students, postdocs
metadata.prerequisites: strong background in mathematics, probability, and at least one application domain
learning_outcomes: Conduct cutting-edge research in Active Inference
Apply Active Inference to new domains
